author: iarspider
body:
#### PR description:

In GCC13 IBs, compiler warns that max_pt_idx could be used uninitialized:

```
src/DQMOffline/MuonDPG/src/BaseTnPEfficiencyTask.cc: In member function 'analyze':
  src/DQMOffline/MuonDPG/src/BaseTnPEfficiencyTask.cc:175:31: warning: 'max_pt_idx' may be used uninitialized [-Wmaybe-uninitialized]
   175 |       probe_indices.push_back(max_pt_idx);
      |                               ^
src/DQMOffline/MuonDPG/src/BaseTnPEfficiencyTask.cc:145:9: note: 'max_pt_idx' was declared here
  145 |     int max_pt_idx;
      |         ^
```

This is clearly a false-positive, but I modified the code to avoid the warning anyway.

#### PR validation:

Bot tests
title: [GCC13] Avoid maybe-uninitialized warning in BaseTnPEfficiencyTask::analyze
